## Slots

| Slot             | Description        |
| ---------------- | ------------------ |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                           | Description              |
| ------------------------------ | ------------------------ |
| `--c-toolbar-background-color` | Toolbar background color |
| `--c-toolbar-text-color`       | Toolbar text color       |
